chapter.title: Modifying your web application to deploy to OpenShift Express
chapter.para: Open the pom.xml file of your web application in the editor by double-clicking on the file in your Project Explorer and selecting the pom.xml tab in your workbench.
Create profiles tags within the project tags of the pom.xml file. Within the profiles tags, press Ctrl and Spacebar together to trigger auto-completion.
From the context menu of the auto-completion, select OpenShift Express profile - OpenShift Express profile. Doing so will insert the profile information necessary to connect to OpenShift Express.
